articles.author: Navdeep Singh
articles.title: Sensex jumps 300 points on hopes of Fed rate hike pause, firm global cues - The Economic Times
articles.description: From the Sensex pack, M&M, ICICI Bank, and Wipro were the top gainers, rising over 1% each. Power Grid, HCL Tech, Bajaj Finserv, Axis Bank, Bajaj Finance, and Tata Motors also opened higher. On the other hand, only Nestle, Tech Mahindra, and Asian Paints open…
articles.content: Indian equity indices opened higher for the second straight session on Monday, following gains in the broader Asian market, as mixed US jobs data bolstered expectations that the US Fed may skip an in… [+3252 chars]

articles.title: Menopause: How can women take care of their skin in their 50s and beyond - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: In this instalment of CNA Women’s series on menopause, we look at how fluctuating hormones affect the skin, what products you should use and avoid, and how to keep your skin healthy and strong.
articles.content:
The skin is the largest organ you have, and it changes with age, including during menopause, when oestrogen levels decline rapidly.
The dip doesnt happen suddenly it would have started after you hit… [+1014 chars]
